datasource.name: ds_formular_etabler_nedsivningsanlaeg
datasource.sql:
insert into selvbetjening.formular_etabler_nedsivningsanlaeg ( soegtadr , soegtmatr , soegtejer , ejd_adresse , ejers_navn , ejers_adresse , ejers_email , ejers_tlf , km_navn, km_adresse, km_mail, km_cvr, benyttelse ,
eks_forh_antalpe, eks_forh_spabad,
eks_forh_vandforsyning , eks_forh_vandvaerk , eks_forh_bundfaeldning , eks_forh_husspildevand , eks_forh_bortskaffelse , eks_forh_bortskaf_beskrivelse ,
eks_forh_saerlige_forhold,
frem_forh_placering , frem_forh_accpet , frem_forh_tryksat , frem_forh_overterraen ,
frem_forh_afstand_sivdraen_gvs, frem_forh_afstand_sivdraen_ter, frem_forh_mile,
frem_forh_flerehusstande , frem_forh_antalhusstande , frem_forh_spildvandstype , frem_forh_groeftareal , frem_forh_sivelaengde , frem_forh_siveareal , frem_forh_eksisterendebundtanke , frem_forh_nytank_kamre , frem_forh_nytank_vol , frem_forh_nytank_type ,
frem_forh_nytank_type_txt ,
frem_forh_belastning , frem_forh_belastning_detalje ,
frem_forh_sigteanalyse,
afstand_naermestebygning , afstand_naermesteskel , afstand_naermesteboring , afstand_naermesteandenboring, afstand_vandvaerkmindre , afstand_vandvaerkmindrenavn , afstand_vandvaerkmere , afstand_vandvaerkmerenavn , afstand_proj_kyst , afstand_proj_kyst_meter , afstand_proj_soe , afstand_proj_soe_meter , afstand_proj_vandloeb , afstand_proj_vandloeb_meter , afstand_proj_groeft , afstand_proj_groeft_meter , afstand_proj_draenled , afstand_proj_draenled_meter , afstand_proj_stejle , afstand_proj_stejle_meter , proj_gravhoeje , afstand_proj_gravhoej_meter , afstand_proj_fortidsminder, afstand_proj_andre_nedsivningsanlaeg, journalnr , ref, login, dagsdato, kloakplan, andre_dok, afstand_markvandingsboringer, frem_forh_pejling_dato, frem_forh_tro_og_love, wkb_geometry) values ( [string: if isDefined(address_soeg) then address_soeg else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(matrikelnr) then matrikelnr else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(ejer) then ejer else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(ejendommens_adresse) then ejendommens_adresse else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(navn) then navn else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(adresse) then adresse else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(email) then email else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(ejers_tlf) then ToNumber(ejers_tlf) else 0 endif], [string: if isDefined(km_navn) then km_navn else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(km_adr) then km_adr else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(km_email) then km_email else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(km_cvr) then km_cvr else "" endif],
[string: if isDefined(eks_forh_benyttelse) then eks_forh_benyttelse else "" endif],
[string: if isDefined(eks_forh_antalpe) then eks_forh_antalpe else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(eks_forh_spabad) then eks_forh_spabad else "" endif],
[string: if isDefined(eks_forh_vandforsyning) then eks_forh_vandforsyning else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(eks_forh_vandvaerk) then eks_forh_vandvaerk else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(eks_forh_bundfaeldning) then eks_forh_bundfaeldning else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(eks_forh_husspildevand) then eks_forh_husspildevand else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(eks_forh_bortskaffelse) then eks_forh_bortskaffelse else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(eks_forh_bortskaf_beskrivelse) then eks_forh_bortskaf_beskrivelse else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(eks_forh_saerlige_forhold) then eks_forh_saerlige_forhold else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_placering) then frem_forh_placering else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_accpet) then frem_forh_accpet else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_tryksat) then frem_forh_tryksat else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_overterraen) then frem_forh_overterraen else "" endif],
[number: if isDefined(frem_forh_afstand_sivdraen_gvs) then ToNumber(frem_forh_afstand_sivdraen_gvs) else -1 endif], [number: if isDefined(frem_forh_afstand_sivdraen_ter) then ToNumber(frem_forh_afstand_sivdraen_ter) else -1 endif], [number: if isDefined(frem_forh_mile) then ToNumber(frem_forh_mile) else "" endif],
[string: if isDefined(frem_forh_flerehusstande) then frem_forh_flerehusstande else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(frem_forh_antalhusstande) then ToNumber(frem_forh_antalhusstande) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_spildvandstype) then frem_forh_spildvandstype else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_groeftareal) then frem_forh_groeftareal else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(frem_forh_sivelaengde) then ToNumber(frem_forh_sivelaengde) else -1 endif], [number: if isDefined(frem_forh_siveareal) then ToNumber(frem_forh_siveareal) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_eksisterendebundtanke) then frem_forh_eksisterendebundtanke else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(frem_forh_nytank_kamre) then ToNumber(frem_forh_nytank_kamre) else -1 endif], [number: if isDefined(frem_forh_nytank_vol) then ToNumber(frem_forh_nytank_vol) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_nytank_type) then frem_forh_nytank_type else "" endif],
[string: if isDefined(frem_forh_nytank_type_txt) then frem_forh_nytank_type_txt else "" endif],
[string: if isDefined(frem_forh_belastning) then frem_forh_belastning else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_belastning_detalje) then frem_forh_belastning_detalje else "" endif],
[string: if isDefined(frem_forh_sigteanalyse) then frem_forh_sigteanalyse else "" endif],
[string: if isDefined(afstand_naermestebygning) then afstand_naermestebygning else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_naermesteskel) then afstand_naermesteskel else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_naermesteboring) then afstand_naermesteboring else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_naermesteandenboring) then afstand_naermesteandenboring else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_vandvaerkmindre) then afstand_vandvaerkmindre else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_vandvaerkmindrenavn) then afstand_vandvaerkmindrenavn else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_vandvaerkmere) then afstand_vandvaerkmere else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_vandvaerkmerenavn) then afstand_vandvaerkmerenavn else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_kyst) then afstand_proj_kyst else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(afstand_proj_kyst_meter) then ToNumber(afstand_proj_kyst_meter) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_soe) then afstand_proj_soe else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(afstand_proj_soe_meter) then ToNumber(afstand_proj_soe_meter) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_vandloeb) then afstand_proj_vandloeb else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(afstand_proj_vandloeb_meter) then ToNumber(afstand_proj_kyst_meter) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_groeft) then afstand_proj_groeft else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(afstand_proj_groeft_meter) then ToNumber(afstand_proj_groeft_meter) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_draenled) then afstand_proj_draenled else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(afstand_proj_draenled_meter) then ToNumber(afstand_proj_draenled_meter) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_stejle) then afstand_proj_stejle else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(afstand_proj_stejle_meter) then ToNumber(afstand_proj_stejle_meter) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_gravhoeje) then afstand_proj_gravhoeje else "" endif], [number: if isDefined(afstand_proj_gravhoej_meter) then ToNumber(afstand_proj_gravhoej_meter) else -1 endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_fortidsminder) then afstand_proj_fortidsminder else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_proj_andre_nedsivningsanlaeg) then afstand_proj_andre_nedsivningsanlaeg else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(journalnr) then journalnr else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(sessionid) then sessionid else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(login) then login else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(dagsdato) then dagsdato else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(kloakplan) then kloakplan else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(andre_dok) then andre_dok else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(afstand_markvandingsboringer) then afstand_markvandingsboringer else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_pejling_dato) then frem_forh_pejling_dato else "" endif], [string: if isDefined(frem_forh_tro_og_love) then frem_forh_tro_og_love else "" endif], [geometry: ToGeometry(wkt)])
